Package com.authenticket.authenticket.service.impl

Class AuthenticationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.authenticket.authenticket.service.Utility
com.authenticket.authenticket.service.impl.AuthenticationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticationService
@Service public class AuthenticationServiceImpl extends Utility implements AuthenticationService
This class provides the implementation of the `AuthenticationService` interface, which handles user authentication, registration, and confirmation, as well as admin and event organiser authentication and registration.

      public void userRegister(User request)
      Register a new user and send an email for confirmation.
      Specified by:
      userRegister in interface AuthenticationService
      Parameters:
      request - The user registration request.
      Throws:
      AlreadyExistsException - if the user already exists or is awaiting verification.

    • userAuthenticate

      public AuthenticationUserResponse userAuthenticate(String email, String password)
      Authenticate a user using their email and password.
      Specified by:
      userAuthenticate in interface AuthenticationService
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email.
      password - The user's password.
      Returns:
      An authentication response containing a token and user details.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if the user does not exist.

    • confirmUserToken

      public AuthenticationUserResponse confirmUserToken(String token)
      Confirm a user's registration using a confirmation token.
      Specified by:
      confirmUserToken in interface AuthenticationService
      Parameters:
      token - The confirmation token.
      Returns:
      An authentication response containing a token and user details.
      Throws:
      AwaitingVerificationException - if the token is expired or the email is already confirmed.

      Specified by:

      Throws:

    • orgAuthenticate

      public AuthenticationOrgResponse orgAuthenticate(String email, String password)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      email - The event organiser's email.
      password - The event organiser's password.
      Returns:
